data.title: Writing Summer Camp
data.meta_description: What if America lost the Revolutionary war? What if Da Vinci built the first airplane 500 years ago? What if the Industrial Revolution never happened? In this camp YOU will have the opportunity to write a new history, telling stories about a past unlike any other.  If you could change a moment in time—would you? […]
data.text:
What if America lost the Revolutionary war? What if Da Vinci built the first airplane 500 years ago? What if the Industrial Revolution never happened? In this camp YOU will have the opportunity to write a new history, telling stories about a past unlike any other. If you could change a moment in time—would you?

Highlights of the camp can include:

Unleashing your creativity to write stories of a new past

Rolling our Story Dice and competing in the Historic Fiction Awards

Experiencing alternate history TV, movies, and games

Member Pricing

Student, Teacher, Individual, & Dual $365

Family, Sustaining, & Sponsor $355

Sponsor $355

Patron & Director's Roundtable$345

Benefactor's Circle & Chairman's Circle $335

Phoenix Society & The 1926 Circle $325

Not-yet-member Pricing

$375 per camper

Details

Ages 12–14
